mapper.select: select nvl(depth1,0) depth1,nvl(depth2,0) depth2,nvl(depth3,0) depth3, nvl(depth4,0) depth4,nvl(depth5,0) depth5 from buseo order by depth1,depth2 ,depth3 , depth4 , depth5
select depth1 from buseo group by depth1 having count(*)>=1 and depth1 is not null order by depth1
select depth1 from buseo group by depth1 having count(*)>1 and depth1 is not null order by depth1
select depth2 from buseo group by depth2 having count(*)>=1 and depth2 is not null order by depth2
select depth2 from buseo group by depth2 having count(*)>1 and depth2 is not null order by depth2
select depth3 from buseo group by depth3 having count(*)>=1 and depth3 is not null order by depth3
select depth3 from buseo group by depth3 having count(*)>1 and depth3 is not null order by depth3
select depth4 from buseo group by depth4 having count(*)>=1 and depth4 is not null order by depth4
select depth4 from buseo group by depth4 having count(*)>1 and depth4 is not null order by depth4
select depth5 from buseo group by depth5 having count(*)>=1 and depth5 is not null order by depth5
